channel.title: Help
channel.description: how do u make christmas crackers work? so it gives a random phat

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

Here try this:

Search for:

if(itemUseID == 962) {

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (get == 1) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); addItem(1, 1); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); p2.addItem(1, 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }

if this doesnt work let me know.

Also you might have to change the ‘962’ because of the updates.

Read full topic
